Key Match Events: Harry Kane scored the opening goal for England in the 18th minute
Morten Hjulmand scored an equalizing goal for Denmark in the 30th minute
Phil Foden hit a post in the second half for England
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate accepts blame for England's draw
England struggled after taking the lead and lacked structure and progressive patterns in midfield
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Denmark support chanted 'It's Never Coming Home' to the tune of 'Yellow Submarine'
Others: Kyle Walker had to change his boots after rolling his ankle on the turf
Conor Gallagher was booked for a stamp on Christensen
